content: this is the official ravelry page for the scheepjes sponsored crochet along 2018 hosted by keep calm and crochet on uk kcacouk the stitch story cal will start on 4 july 2018 and will run for 13 weeks please note this pattern will be available in instalments for free on my blog this listing is for a full 46 page pdf e-book which has the full pattern descriptions charts and information all in one place without adverts during the duration of the cal this pattern will be released block by block via ravelry updates so as not to spoilt anyone s fun this is a cal with a bit of a difference every two weeks you will receive a pattern for one of twelve differently designed squares there will be two sizes of each square that you can choose from either a 15cm 6 block or a 30cm 12 block - which one you make is totally up to you make one all one size or mix and match whatever takes your fancy this afghan will be completely unique to you with lots of stitches so it won t get boring after we have made all of our blocks the last few weeks will include instructions for joining your squares together and adding a border you will need at least 1800g 36 x 50g balls / 5 040m of yarn the single coloured blanket in the photos is made from scheepjes soft fun denim yarn shade 507 the multicoloured blanket in the photos is made from scheepjes colour crafter in the following shades and amounts hasselt shade 2010 x 2 vlissingen shade 1723 x 2 ermelo shade 1710 x 2 veenendaal shade 1064 x3 haarlem shade 1054 x 3 and breda shade 1029 x 3 please note that these amounts are approximated actual finished blankets may vary depending on hook used and own personal gauge when crocheting i would always round up a bit as some stitches take more yarn that others you can find all the cal details and schedule on my blog follow on the blog https //keepcalmandcrochetonuk wordpress com join the facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/1512395979046485/ if you like this pattern then please come check out my other designs www ravelry com/designers/heather-c-gibbs this pattern is c designed by heather gibbs 2018 and is for personal use only not for resale patterns are not to be copied sold or distributed however you are welcome to donate gift as well as sell any of your finished items if you are an individual crafter if you sell your work online please credit the work as appropriate and link to my pages where you can http //keepcalmandcrochetonuk wordpress com/ http //facebook com/keepcalmandcrochetonuk http //ravelry com/designers/heather-c-gibbs http //designers loveknitting com/ https //www instagram com/kcaco uk/ http //craftsy com/user/pattern/store/833712 http //pinterest com/kcacouk/ http //twitter com/kcacouk http //tinyurl com/kcacouk-on-google
